parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to roll away unintentionally, even when the gear selector is in the "Park" position, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls forward or moves without warning
even when the gear selector is in the "Park" position
the gear selector lights flash
the vehicle stalls or hesitates to move
the vehicle requires the use of the emergency brake to prevent rolling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The accumulation of condensation in the passenger front headlight can cause damage to the headlight, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Water or moisture accumulation in the headlight
foggy or cloudy headlight
headlight failure or malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Delays in addressing open recalls can lead to prolonged exposure to potential safety risks, compromising vehicle safety and performance.
symptoms: Unavailability of recall service
long wait times for recall repairs
lack of communication from dealerships regarding recall status.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the camshaft adjuster central bolts can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of acceleration and potentially causing accidents. Additionally, the failure can also lead to engine damage and potentially cause a fire while the vehicle is parked.
symptoms: Knocking sound from the engine
loss of acceleration
fault all-wheel drive system warning light illumination
check engine warning light intermittent illumination
Auto START/STOP system deactivation.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defect Causing Fire Risk While Parked
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defect can cause the vehicle to catch fire while parked, posing a significant safety risk to the vehicle occupants and surrounding property.
symptoms: No specific symptoms mentioned
but a recall notice was issued for the defect.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents, and can also drain the battery, leaving the vehicle stranded.
symptoms: The PCM infotainment unit continuously reboots itself
the stereo system malfunctions
the back camera fails to operate
the battery drains rapidly.
